verses.verse: וְהִנֵּ֣ה׀ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh now behold אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish a man אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God בָּ֧א <S%H935><s%> ba And behold there came מִיהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> mi-hu-Dah out of Judah בִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> bid-Var by the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El; unto Bethel וְיָרָבְעָ֛ם <S%H3379><s%> ve-ya-ra-ve-'Am and Jeroboam עֹמֵ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach by the altar לְהַקְטִֽיר׃ <S%H6999><s%> le-hak-Tir. to burn incense

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra And he cried עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach against the altar בִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> bid-Var in the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said מִזְבֵּ֣חַ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach O altar מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach, altar כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- Behold בֵ֞ן <S%H1121><s%> ven Behold a child נוֹלָ֤ד <S%H3205><s%> no-Lad shall be born לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> le-veit- unto the house דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2977><s%> yo-shi-Ya-hu Josiah שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo, by name וְזָבַ֣ח <S%H2076><s%> ve-za-Vach and upon thee shall he offer עָלֶ֗יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha, against אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כֹּהֲנֵ֤י <S%H3548><s%> ko-ha-Nei the priests הַבָּמוֹת֙ <S%H1116><s%> hab-ba-mOt of the high places הַמַּקְטִרִ֣ים <S%H6999><s%> ham-mak-ti-Rim that burn incense עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha, against וְעַצְמ֥וֹת <S%H6106><s%> ve-'atz-Mot bones אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam upon thee and men's יִשְׂרְפ֥וּ <S%H8313><s%> yis-re-Fu shall be burnt עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha. against

וְנָתַן֩ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan And he gave בַּיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom the same day הַה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu the same מוֹפֵת֙ <S%H4159><s%> mo-Fet a sign לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This הַמּוֹפֵ֔ת <S%H4159><s%> ham-mo-Fet, This [is] the sign אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath spoken יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; which the LORD הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach Behold the altar נִקְרָ֔ע <S%H7167><s%> nik-Ra', shall be rent וְנִשְׁפַּ֖ךְ <S%H8210><s%> ve-nish-Pach that [are] upon it shall be poured out הַדֶּ֥שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> had-De-shen and the ashes אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. and

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> chish-Mo-a' heard הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech And it came to pass when king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> de-Var the saying אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which קָרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra which had cried עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach against the altar בְּבֵֽית־ be-veit- אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El, in Bethel וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach that he put forth יָרָבְעָ֧ם <S%H3379><s%> ya-ra-ve-'Am Jeroboam אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his hand מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al against הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach from the altar לֵאמֹ֣ר׀ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying תִּפְשֻׂ֑הוּ <S%H8610><s%> tif-Su-hu; Lay hold וַתִּיבַ֤שׁ <S%H3001><s%> vat-ti-Vash against him dried up יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do on him And his hand אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach which he put forth עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, against וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יָכֹ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> ya-Chol so that he could לַהֲשִׁיבָ֥הּ <S%H7725><s%> la-ha-shi-Vah not pull it in again אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav. about

וְהַמִּזְבֵּ֣חַ <S%H4196><s%> ve-ham-miz-Be-ach The altar נִקְרָ֔ע <S%H7167><s%> nik-Ra', also was rent וַיִּשָּׁפֵ֥ךְ <S%H8210><s%> vai-yish-sha-Fech poured out הַדֶּ֖שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> had-De-shen and the ashes מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach; from the altar כַּמּוֹפֵ֗ת <S%H4159><s%> kam-mo-Fet, according to the sign אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan had given אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish which the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God בִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> bid-Var by the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an answered הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech And the king וַיֹּ֣אמֶר׀ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish unto the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God חַל־ <S%H2470><s%> chal- Intreat נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> na Please אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei now the face יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God וְהִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <S%H6419><s%> ve-hit-pal-Lel and pray בַּעֲדִ֔י <S%H1157><s%> ba-'a-Di, about וְתָשֹׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-ta-Sho may be restored me again יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di for me that my hand אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; about וַיְחַ֤ל <S%H2470><s%> vay-Chal entreated אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- And the man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei accept יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD וַתָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vat-Ta-shov was restored him again יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- hand הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech and the king's אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him וַתְּהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi became כְּבָרִֽאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <S%H7223><s%> ke-va-Ri-sho-Nah. and became as [it was] before

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech And the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish unto the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God בֹּאָה־ <S%H935><s%> bo-'ah- Come אִתִּ֥י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti for הַבַּ֖יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> hab-Bay-tah home וּֽסְעָ֑דָה <S%H5582><s%> u-se-'A-dah; with me and refresh וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-'et-te-Nah thyself and I will give לְךָ֖ le-Cha מַתָּֽת׃ <S%H4991><s%> mat-Tat. thee a reward

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- And the man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, unto the king אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> tit-ten- If thou wilt give לִי֙ li אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> cha-Tzi me half בֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> vei-Te-cha, thine house לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor אָבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> 'a-Vo I will not go in עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach; you וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor אֹ֤כַל <S%H398><s%> 'O-chal with thee neither will I eat לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> le-chem bread וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor אֶשְׁתֶּה־ <S%H8354><s%> 'esh-teh- nor drink מַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, water בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-Kom in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For כֵ֣ן׀ <S%H3651><s%> chen so צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah For so was it charged אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti, בִּדְבַ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> bid-Var me by the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no תֹ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> To-chal Eat לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem no bread וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor תִשְׁתֶּה־ <S%H8354><s%> tish-teh- nor drink מָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; water וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor תָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> ta-Shuv, nor turn again בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> bad-De-rech by the same way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָלָֽכְתָּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> ha-La-che-ta. that thou camest

וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> be-De-rech way אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher; another וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and did not שָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> shav and returned בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> bad-De-rech, not by the way אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> ba that he came בָ֖הּ vah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵֽל׃ <S%H1008><s%> 'El. to Bethel פ Peh

וְנָבִ֤יא <S%H5030><s%> ve-na-Vi prophet אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad an זָקֵ֔ן <S%H2205><s%> za-Ken, old יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev Now there dwelt בְּבֵֽית־ be-veit- אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El; in Bethel וַיָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came בְנ֡וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No and his sons וַיְסַפֶּר־ <S%H5608><s%> vay-sap-per- and told ל֣וֹ lo אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַמַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> ham-ma-'a-Seh him all the works אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which עָשָׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah had done אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- that the man הָאֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God הַיּ֜וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom that day בְּבֵֽית־ be-veit- אֵ֗ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El, in Bethel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדְּבָרִים֙ <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber which he had spoken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, unto the king וַֽיְסַפְּר֖וּם <S%H5608><s%> vay-sap-pe-Rum them they told לַאֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vi-Hem. also to their father

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem about אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem, And their father אֵֽי־ <S%H335><s%> 'ei- what זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh he הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech unto them What way הָלָ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Lach; went וַיִּרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'U had seen בָנָ֗יו <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav, he;For his sons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech way אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָלַךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> ha-laCh went אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> ba which came מִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> mi-hu-Dah. from Judah

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav, unto his sons חִבְשׁוּ־ <S%H2280><s%> chiv-shu- Saddle לִ֖י li הַחֲמ֑וֹר <S%H2543><s%> ha-cha-Mor; me the ass וַיַּחְבְּשׁוּ־ <S%H2280><s%> vai-yach-be-shu- So they saddled ל֣וֹ lo הַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> ha-cha-Mor, him the ass וַיִּרְכַּ֖ב <S%H7392><s%> vai-yir-Kav and he rode עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. and
